com.easemob.user

Class EaseMobUserConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.easemob.user.EaseMobUserConfig

  • public class EaseMobUserConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    this class is used to store configuration for user sdk most of the configuration are loaded from preference storage

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.lang.String APPKEY 
      Context applicationContext 
      boolean applicationInited
      this flag is used to tell sdk that the application UI is initialed with reqired receiver.
      boolean DEBUG_ENABLED
      flag to enable debug logging
      static int DEFAULT_XMPP_PORT 
      java.lang.String DOMAIN 
      static java.lang.String INTENT_MESSAGE
      constant values
      java.lang.String ORGKEY 
      boolean RosterContactMode
      if the user sdk is configed as roster mode (default mode), it will get user roster contacts from chatsdk after first login otherwise, it will get all users from user server for this app after first login.
      java.lang.String XMPP_RESOURCE

      • applicationInited

        public boolean applicationInited
        this flag is used to tell sdk that the application UI is initialed with reqired receiver. so sdk can send msg to UI using broadcast.

      • INTENT_MESSAGE

        public static final java.lang.String INTENT_MESSAGE
        constant values
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • RosterContactMode

        public boolean RosterContactMode
        if the user sdk is configed as roster mode (default mode), it will get user roster contacts from chatsdk after first login otherwise, it will get all users from user server for this app after first login. Noticed that the retrieve is done in background
